value.title: StarCraft 2: Some TERRIBLE StarCraft Cheeses! (Viewer Games)
value.excerpt: Two games of StarCraft 2. These are viewer submitted games in SC2. The first one is a High Diamond/Low Masters level Zerg versus Zerg. The second a High Bronze/Low Silver Protoss versus Protoss. In both of them, the players execute some terrible cheeses.  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
